rows.label: qst202510_msg0001
rows.name: Onii-chan!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0002
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0003
rows.name: Hey, you're done with work now, right?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0004
rows.name: Well, yeah. The report's finished.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0005
rows.name: Then take me to the Land of Mors.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0006
rows.name: No.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0007
rows.name:
Why not? You're free to act
as you please now, right?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0008
rows.name:
There's no way I can take you
to such a dangerous place!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0009
rows.name:
Besides, didn't you give up on that
after the old man told you no?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0010
rows.name: I didn't exactly give up.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0011
rows.name:
I asked to travel all over Alst,
and he gave me permission.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0012
rows.name:
That, of course, includes the
Land of Mors, doesn't it?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0013
rows.name: What kind of twisted logic is that...?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202510_msg0014
rows.name:
She's quite the
strategist for her size.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0015
rows.name: A promising future, mo.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0016
rows.name:
Hey, it's fine, isn't it?
Take me to the Land of Mors.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0017
rows.name:
No means no! No matter how you
twist it, no is still no!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0018
rows.name:
Ugh, you're so dense! You
stubborn, prodigal old man!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0019
rows.name:
Wha?! I don't have to
take that from you!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0020
rows.name:
Why do you want to go to
the Land of Mors so badly?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0021
rows.name:
There wasn't anything
that interesting there.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0022
rows.name:
You just don't get it. Just
seeing that place is worth it.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0023
rows.name:
And it's a treasure trove!
There are so many things
you can only get there!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0024
rows.name:
I was just going to look,
but now there's something
I want to find there.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0025
rows.name:
You have no idea what
that place is like!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0026
rows.name:
There are tons of fearsome
monsters, you know?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0027
rows.name:
A child without a Blade would be
eaten in less than a minute.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0028
rows.name:
How do you expect to find
anything in a place like that?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0029
rows.name: Then have KOS-MOS Re: as my guard.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0030
rows.name: I'll be safe with her, won't I?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0031
rows.name: Don't just make decisions on your own!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0032
rows.name:
Didn't the King tell
you to be my guard?!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0033
rows.name:
He didn't say I had to listen
to your selfish demands!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0034
rows.name:
I'm going, absolutely! It's useless
for you to stop me, ojisan!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0035
rows.name: I will absolutely not allow it!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0036
rows.name:
Hey, what about you,
KOS-MOS Re:? Of course
you'll come with me, right?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0037
rows.name: If it is an order, I will comply.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0038
rows.name: See? KOS-MOS Re: says it's fine.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0039
rows.name:
However, protecting my
Master is my top priority.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0040
rows.name:
Your priority, Astelle, will
be second to my Master's. Is
that acceptable to you?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0041
rows.name: Eh?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0042
rows.name: See?!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0043
rows.name:
In the first place, you're
not KOS-MOS Re:'s Driver.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0044
rows.name:
Stop being selfish and go
back to Luxuria quietly!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0045
rows.name: Th-that's not true!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0046
rows.name:
I may not be her Driver, but
I'm friends with KOS-MOS Re:!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0047
rows.name: KOS-MOS Re: will absolutely protect me!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0048
rows.name: That's enough!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0049
rows.name: It's like a children's squabble...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202510_msg0050
rows.name:
You know, Zeke, arguing here
is getting us nowhere.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0051
rows.name:
It doesn't seem like Astelle
is going to back down...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202510_msg0052
rows.name:
Why don't we all go to the Land
of Mors and come right back?

rows.label: qst202510_msg0053
rows.name:
Even if you say that, I
can't have everyone accompanying
this selfish girl...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202510_msg0054
rows.name:
It's fine. The King has
helped us a lot, too.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0055
rows.name:
Astelle...[ML:Dash ] in exchange, we'll
pull out immediately if we
think it's dangerous.

rows.label: qst202510_msg0056
rows.name: Yes! That's fine!

rows.label: qst202510_msg0057
rows.name: Then let's go, KOS-MOS Re:!
